{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Icicle Plate |image = [[File:Icicle_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Icicle Plate''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Ice}} }} ==Description== The '''Icicle Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Icicle Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Ice Gems]] {{Gem|Ice}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Icicle Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Icefall Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Ice Path|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Shoal Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Sealed Chamber|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Lake Acuity|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Snowpoint Temple|Epic}} {{LootItem|Plasma Frigate|Epic}} {{LootItem|Giant Chasm|Epic}} {{LootItem|Dragonspiral Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Sea Spirit's Den|Epic}} {{LootItem|Frost Cavern|Epic}} {{LootItem|Mount Lanakila|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
